name: Luisa's Advanced Horrors
description:
Hi and welcome to Luisa's Advanced Horrors! A parody made in RPG Maker VX Ace about Las Basicas de Calvomero en Eduacion y Aprendizaje (A.k.a:Baldi's Basics).

In this RPG Maker VX Ace fan game you will have to deal with Luisa and her many friends (Just her and two other people around there on the demo) after some mathematics gone horribly wrong.

This project is non- profit and many of it's assets are original such as drawings, images, 3D models, sounds and even music, the rest it's from Google Images, but who wouldn't do that too right?

After all that said, enjoy the demo of this "Try and Repeat" experience with oversized toys from 2011.

P.D:If any bugs or glitches are found, put them in the comment section.
